intro_text: As the patrol is marking the border lines, a gang of rogues burst from the long grass! An ambush!
decline_text: The patrol turns tail and races away! The borders are left open for the rogues to muddy.

success_outcomes.text: The patrol descends into battle without a second thought, eventually driving the rogues away.

log.cats_from: from_cat and to_cat drove off rogues together.

success_outcomes.text: s_c immediately leaps to protect {PRONOUN/s_c/poss} Clanmates. {PRONOUN/s_c/poss/CAP} ferocity in battle terrifies the rogues. Realizing that they've sorely underestimated the Clan cats, the rogues turn tail and run.

log.cats_from: from_cat was impressed when to_cat drove rogues off the territory.

success_outcomes.text: s_c revels in the battle, leaping into the fray with {PRONOUN/s_c/poss} teeth bared and claws unsheathed. The rogues are quickly driven away by the patrol.

log.cats_from: from_cat was impressed when to_cat drove rogues off the territory.

fail_outcomes.text: The rogues are terrifyingly coordinated and use the patrol's shock and confusion against them. The patrol cats are picked off one by one, and only a couple manage to escape the slaughter.

history_text.death: This cat was killed when rogues ambushed {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} patrol.

log.cats_from: to_cat failed to drive away rogues while on patrol with from_cat.

fail_outcomes.text: Taken by surprise, the patrol scatters and loses cohesion. The rogues are quick to take advantage of the confusion, and eventually the patrol retreats, r_c badly wounded.

intro_text: As the patrol is marking the border lines, a gang of rogues burst from the long grass! An ambush!
decline_text: r_c turns tail and races away! The rogues have {PRONOUN/r_c/object} far outnumbered; warning the Clan is more important than dying needlessly.

success_outcomes.text: Stunned for a moment, r_c is nearly caught in the teeth of the first rogue, but {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} {VERB/r_c/manage/manages} to dodge and weave through the onslaught of attacks, eventually escaping the fray and pelting towards camp with yowls of warning bursting from {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} lungs.

Alarmed by the Clan cat's lack of fear and self-preservation, the rogues freeze. s_c sees {PRONOUN/s_c/poss} opportunity to run and takes it, racing back to the camp to gather more warriors and return.

intro_text: As the patrol is marking the border lines, a gang of rogues stride out of the long grass to confront the Clan cats!
decline_text: The patrol turns tail and races away! The borders are left open for the rogues to muddy.

success_outcomes.text: The rogues posture and jeer, eventually provoking a battle. The Clan cats are strong, however, and the rogues seem to be weakened by hunger. The patrol easily drives the intruders away.

log.cats_from: from_cat heard about to_cat's victory in battle against a gang of rogues.

success_outcomes.text: The rogues posture and jeer, eventually provoking a battle. The Clan cats are strong, however, and after a short fight, the rogues are forced to retreat.

success_outcomes.text: s_c takes the lead, confronting the gang with confidence. Tensions are eased when s_c informs the rogues of a prey-rich forest outside of c_n territory.

intro_text: On {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} way to mark the far corners of {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} plains, r_c starts telling a story of {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} ancestors to keep every cat entertained.
decline_text: r_c nearly trips into a rabbit burrow and decides to watch where {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} paws are going instead.

success_outcomes.text: It keeps the cats' minds off the distance they have to cover. The patrol goes quickly and easily.

log.cats_from: from_cat enjoyed a story told by to_cat.

success_outcomes.text: s_c spins a vivid, engaging tale of a massive war their ancestors fought over the border the patrol is headed to mark. Not only does it keep every cat entertained, but it also emphasizes the importance of the patrol and motivates everyone.

log.cats_from: from_cat really enjoyed a story told by to_cat.

success_outcomes.text: It's a fantastic idea, making the patrol fly by as cats chat and laugh with their Clanmates, and everyone ends the day feeling much closer to each other.

log.cats_from: from_cat and to_cat chatted on patrol.
from_cat discovers to_cat is lots of fun to patrol with.

fail_outcomes.text: {PRONOUN/r_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/r_c/try/tries}, but {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} Clanmates seem unenthused, so r_c stops.

log.cats_from: from_cat tried to tell a story on patrol, but to_cat seemed uninterested.

fail_outcomes.text: s_c takes r_c aside and reminds {PRONOUN/r_c/object} coldly to focus on {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} duties.

log.cats_from: from_cat was rebuked by to_cat on patrol.
to_cat was chatting and telling stories instead of focusing on the patrol with from_cat.

intro_text: This is just weird - what's made the grass here grow to such a uniform low height? Why is it so green? Why has it grown in such a neat circle?
decline_text: Look, app1 knows grass, and this is too weird to want to spend time in. {PRONOUN/app1/subject/CAP} {VERB/app1/head/heads} home without ever seeing the Fresno Nightcrawler.

success_outcomes.text: Okay, app1 knows that Twolegs have, well, two legs, but that is just excessive, the Twoleg that owns this weird green circle is almost nothing but leg! Friendly though, and they don't try to invade app1's space.

fail_outcomes.text: AH! app1 gets run over by an enormously tall Twoleg running in random circles around the green grass.

intro_text: As the patrol moves through the grass just after sunset, two moons rise in the sky...
decline_text: One of those moons has the same metal as a monster, the same glowing eyes that glare from the creatures that kill on the Thunderpaths. The cats hide from its sight, trembling.

success_outcomes.text: Two whole moons! That's got to be lucky, the cats decide, sitting on a little rock still warm from the sun to stargaze.

log.cats_from: from_cat and to_cat felt lucky after seeing two moons on patrol.

fail_outcomes.text: One of those moons is getting awfully... close... r_c gets caught in a strange wind that picks {PRONOUN/r_c/object} up, claws scrabbling wildly, sucked towards the frightening foreign moon as it takes {PRONOUN/r_c/object} away from c_n.

intro_text: As the cats remark the border, p_l asks if they remember the tale of the beautiful molly and the monstrous tom. Once upon a time, the mighty tom of the plains found a beautiful molly on the border of his lands, skinny and trembling...
decline_text: This... really isn't the time to stop for a story.

success_outcomes.text: Outraged, the tom drew his claws - only for the molly to disappear in a burst of starlight, StarClan judging the tom for his monstrous heart. His scent grew foul, his whiskers fell off, his claws blunted, and so the first coyote was born, howling his anger and loss.

log.cats_from: from_cat enjoyed to_cat's story about the first coyote.

success_outcomes.text: With a terrifying anger, the tom unsheathed his claws... but luckily for the molly, she was a StarClan cat in disguise, and with a burst of starlight, StarClan judged him, and turned him into a horrifying monster... a coyote.

log.cats_from: from_cat enjoyed to_cat's story of the first coyote.

success_outcomes.text: The powerful tom went to chase her off, but StarClan judged him a monster, and cursed him to become a coyote. It is a lesson all can take note of - the stars will judge you for your actions.

log.cats_from: from_cat enjoyed to_cat's story of the first coyote.

success_outcomes.text: The tom drove the molly off and was cursed by StarClan for his cruelty. And good thing too, s_c pipes up! Evil like that should always be punished!

log.cats_from: from_cat enjoyed to_cat's story of StarClan cursing a cruel tom.
from_cat noticed how principled to_cat is on patrol.

fail_outcomes.text: The patrol isn't interested in hearing p_l's fable as they work. A pity - one should always remember the lessons of c_n's myths.

log.cats_from: from_cat was disappointed that no cat wanted to hear {PRONOUN/from_cat/poss} story on patrol.

intro_text: The patrol catches the scent of a fox - but is it red or swift?
decline_text: The patrol decides not to pursue the fox.

success_outcomes.text: The red vixen smells of milk, and hopefully by driving her out of the territory, her litter won't be a threat to the Clan. If they don't starve, c_n will hunt them down - they do not share territory with foxes.

log.cats_from: from_cat and to_cat worked together to drive a vixen out of their territory.
from_cat heard about how to_cat's patrol drove a vixen out of their territory.

success_outcomes.text: The patrol drives away the red fox, seeks out her den, and kills her young cubs. It's brutal, but these fluffy baby foxes would one day have grown to be kit-killers and thieves.

log.cats_from: from_cat and to_cat worked together to drive off a vixen and kill her cubs.
from_cat heard about how to_cat's patrol drove out a vixen and killed her cubs.

success_outcomes.text: s_c displays incredible skill, driving the mother red vixen out of the territory almost by {PRONOUN/s_c/self}. Now neither the fox nor her cubs pose a threat to the Clan. It truly proves s_c's place as one of c_n's most talented and skillful fighters.

log.cats_from: from_cat was extremely impressed by to_cat's skill in battle against a vixen.
from_cat heard about how to_cat's patrol drove off a vixen.

success_outcomes.text: The patrol overcomes the red vixen and drives her off thanks to a brilliant battle move by s_c at a critical moment. {PRONOUN/s_c/poss/CAP} bravery ensures the patrol's success, and the cats arrive back at camp singing {PRONOUN/s_c/poss} praises to make sure the Clan knows it.

log.cats_from: to_cat's bravery in a fight against a vixen greatly impressed from_cat.

success_outcomes.text: Led by p_l, and with a heap of cooperation and teamwork, the patrol drives away a red fox vixen, seeking out her den and killing her young cubs. The plains will be safe from both the threat the vixen posed this season, and the threat her cubs would've posed to c_n in the seasons to come.

log.cats_from: from_cat and to_cat worked together to drive a vixen out of their territory.
from_cat heard about how to_cat's patrol drove a vixen out of their territory.

success_outcomes.text: With so many cats working together in tight coordination, they manage to accomplish the near-impossible, finding and killing a mother red vixen and ending the threat to the Clan that she and her cubs pose.

log.cats_from: from_cat and to_cat worked together to kill a vixen and her cubs.
from_cat heard about how to_cat's patrol killed a vixen and her cubs.

fail_outcomes.text: The mother red fox is vicious and determined, and the small patrol is beaten back. But these plains belong to c_n, and they haven't given up. They may have lost this battle, but c_n will win this war.

log.cats_from: from_cat and to_cat were unable to drive off a vixen together.

fail_outcomes.text: The mother red fox is vicious and determined. Although they lose this battle, through teamwork the cats manage to retreat without injury.
Never threaten a mother's young - the red vixen kills r_c in the skirmish.

history_text.scar: m_c carries a scar from a fox fight.
history_text.death: m_c fell in battle with a fox.

log.cats_from: from_cat heard that to_cat was unable to save r_c in a fight with a red vixen.
This is intended to balance the negative value associated with this cat's death. Report this text as a bug if you see it.

fail_outcomes.text: The mother red fox's snapping jaws leave r_c dripping blood onto the grass, forcing the patrol to back off.

history_text.scar: m_c carries a scar from a fox fight.
history_text.death: m_c fell in battle with a fox.

log.cats_from: to_cat and from_cat were unable to drive off a vixen together.

fail_outcomes.text: s_c is determined to win, but {PRONOUN/s_c/poss} confidence is misplaced. {PRONOUN/s_c/subject/CAP}{VERB/s_c/'re/'s} a good fighter, but not a great one, and the red vixen manages to sink her teeth into {PRONOUN/s_c/object}. The patrol rallies around s_c, but they have to give up on the fight.

history_text.scar: m_c carries a scar from a fox fight.
history_text.death: m_c fell in battle with a fox.

log.cats_from: to_cat's overconfident move in a fight against a vixen cost from_cat's patrol the battle.
